Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lee M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: little hotel straight road tram stop easy own key please staff friendly spacious clean beds comfy noise outside sleep couldnt fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very Affordable, In a Lively Part of Town, Stay Here.”
Reviews.Author: Doodyjazz
Reviews.Content: hotel plantage located plantage town artis zoo easy tram bus water taxi average size according amsterdam standards kept clean nice quiet neighborhood clean bed bathroom plan spending trip hotel adventurer crash pad perfect cant believe reviewer location isnt couldnt wrong town town isnt crowded central close restaurants turkish italian pizza chinese indian indonesian thai french dutch bakery butcher shop super market milk shop rate attractions outside front door artis zoo resistance museum park hortus university amsterdam walking distance museum rembrandt lived cafes choose en cafe corner street level floor building wonderful cafe street towards hortus coffeeshops town het private showerbathroom color tv hair dryer safe fridge fresh coffee soft drinks available lobby plus internet telephone fax service hotel plantage bargain buck especially town street twice luxury type comfortable save lot money staying

Reviews.Title: “Adequate accommodation”
Reviews.Author: SKDLondon
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel plantage october staying 4 vary greatly size layout didnt wardrobe lobby main bathroom basic hotel bedlinen showers towels clean dont look closely carpets curtains arrive day evening reception service unhelpful inflexible pay upfront doesnt inspire confidence plus quieter town tram routes centre downstairs cafe nice breakfast evening drink probably

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I've Ever Stayed - Accused of Blackmail by Staff!”
Reviews.Author: bedeviledegg
Reviews.Content: stayed 34 attic hotel location neat little outside hustle city close building giving lot character thats nice filthy bugs sheets marks walls hair stuff left previous occupant drain didnt leaving inch water bathroom floor floor tile separation shower top staff accused traveled amsterdam germany hotel sort resort booked 120 euros night dealt photos ive posted havent seen checkout staff photos concerned calling major refund worse staff attitude trying scam spider flown window wait morning tell trying poor reviews book yes traveled 5000 miles amsterdam hotel sarcasm surreal staff blaming guest vigilant selecting hotel bugs filthy bathroom drain didnt normal guests fault plus talking owner wasnt offered refund offered discounted stay absolutely laughable save trouble look photos ive attached book else

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly staff and comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: FlameLady
Reviews.Content: stay pleasant im amsterdam id stay location convenient stops form centre staff friendly clean huge bathroom disadvantage hotel doesnt provide breakfast food

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money!”

Reviews.Content: occaision feel person looking staying amsterdam numerous occasions expect regards budget hotels city worst stayed dont twisted im maintance expect basic hospitality hotel recieve arrival allocated attic recpetionist explained recieve housekeeping clean towel cupboard 3m 4m bigger 5 lights 5 1 extention cable 20 electric 20 roof window view didnt shut properly little space heater dirty damp smelt stale coffeeshop tv bed top stool knocked entering bathroom foul ventilation ceiling covered mould shower easiest sit toilet shower bathroom door filty rotten slimey 2 night electric meant pitch black hotel guy saying wasnt fault willing stay cold pitch black allocated window bit light night lights outside ok dam sight cleaner bearable raises question cupboard pay double didnt understand telling loud til 3 morning sleep ave leave 6 am pissed understatement hotel request stay cupboard top dont didnt warn yuck oh hotel internet dosent dont bother

Reviews.Title: “Worth Every Penny.”
Reviews.Author: Foxtravler
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed mid october getaway stayed top attic view breathtaking plantage beautiful little neighborhood busy day peaceful evening tram 9 14 picks directly outside hotel atm outside restaurants hotel service wonderful housekeeping based request perfect opinion friendly youre wimp carrying own luggage climbing stairs plan staying late enjoying finer amsterdam dont worry finding hotel hotel convenient neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Good location, poor hotel...”
Reviews.Author: fawky
Reviews.Content: stayed march 2009 lot trouble finding hotel initially hard navigate amsterdam especially youve arrived impression hotel soso stayed owner staff helping friendly staff friendly spoke english lots advice tips offer free internet reception handy plenty vending machines reception im handy steep descent narrow flight stairs incredibly difficult backpack topple backwards okay clean suppose decide pull sleeping bags pillowcases backpacks instead sleep plantage beds bathroom little weird supply tub liquid soap didnt shower curtain wet toilet speaking toilet weird glass seats shells etc im glad wasnt spiders broken hop carefully neighbourhood lovely leafy busy families short stroll heart amsterdam extremely safe night time little cafe below plantage coffee tea breakfasts morning day plantage held bags free charge werent leaving amsterdam night overnight train copenhagen wouldnt stay plantage fine 60 aud night budget time

Reviews.Title: “15 minutes from madness. Great place to start. Going back soon.”
Reviews.Author: fillymac
Reviews.Content: opposite zoo 15 minutes walk bulldog x3 nice walk main squares supermarket close cigarette shop opposite hotel staff friendly 15 house overlooks crossroads bikes cars trams tram 9 takes hotel dam sq 9 stops hours ticket bulldog krista breakfast garlic

Reviews.Title: “One saving grace - the location”
Reviews.Author: drarbeit
Reviews.Content: hotel plantage plantage amsterdam quiet nontouristy cafes restaurant connected walk main town 20 min bad else filthy carpetting rotten bathrooms shower cabin actually leave clothes theyll wet shower toilet else stairs narrow steep travelled hand luggage hard time negotiating baggage helps hotel costs night

Reviews.Title: “Cute hotel”
Reviews.Author: CoSSack_Don
Reviews.Content: nice hotel close center usual amusements friendly stuff allowed leave luggage check flight evening helps lot extra time spend city surely friends

Reviews.Title: “+5”
Reviews.Author: Julia_Dreams
Reviews.Content: hotel plantage close artis zoo front 5 minutes walking distance hortus park hope wrote correct amsterdam central station 15 20 minutes walking distance tram becouse kids otherwise walk city defenetly coming

Reviews.Title: “Plantage is cheap and you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: amarith1972
Reviews.Content: stayed painted recarpeted stairs doing whilst stayed attic grand except shower didnt drain properly otherwise staff friendly tolerant normal 12 stag overall unpretentious accomodation friendly informative staff dont expect perfection marble floors
